What are the advantages and disadvantages to having one language in the world?

This essay will examine the case of this action and the forthcoming paragraphs discussed both the benefits and the drawbacks.

On the one hand, the basic advantage is that people may  exchange feelings. Because one accent classification to aid  increase import and export among the authorities.
